alert.note: Alert for San Carlos (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 09 at 1:10PM MST until December 10 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower 30s expected. * WHERE...San Carlos. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
